articles.author: Kate Dennett, Rachael Bunyan
articles.title: Marta Kauffman says it was a 'mistake' to refer to Chandler Bing's trans parent with male pronouns - Daily Mail
articles.description: The writer, 65, who created the long-running American sitcom with David Crane, said it was a 'mistake' to use male pronouns and the word 'father' to refer to the transgender woman.
articles.content:
Friends co-creator Marta Kauffman has once again expressed her regret over the representation of Chandler Bing's transgender parent on the show.

articles.title: 309th mass shooting this year: America’s gun violence epidemic - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The rampage in Highland Park, Chicago, came on July 4, the day Americans are meant to take to the streets to celebrate the good things about their country.

articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner sends letter to President Biden pleading for his help - CBC Sports
articles.description: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forget about me and the other American Detainees."

articles.title: Fitness crisis? Only 7% of U.S. adults have good cardiometabolic health - Study Finds
articles.description: The study found American health has been in steep decline over the last 20 years.
articles.content: MEDFORD, Mass. — More than nine in 10 American adults may want to think about skipping the summertime barbeques and go on a diet instead. A new study has found that less than seven percent of the nat… [+4023 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox virus mutations 'challenging' what we know - DW (English)
articles.description: New research suggests that monkeypox is mutating surprisingly fast in Europe and North America. The study shows how little we know about the virus.
